name: Odd Cat Out
description:
Send the murderer cats to court!

Murderer cats are always slow,

AND they always have a 3rd whisker,

Guess wrong, and you lose!

(Click the cats you want to catch!)

(You will have to catch more and more murderers... it will get harder and harder..)

Game on Scratch : https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/757136355/fullscreen/
